      static float runLineSpanToIndex(char[] text, android.text.TextPaint paint, su.whs.watl.text.LineSpan span, su.whs.watl.text.LineSpanBreak spanBreak, int lineStart, int index, int margin, int direction, float justifyArgument, int width, android.graphics.Rect textPaddings, android.graphics.Rect drawablePaddings)
      returns drawing start coordinate for character at position 'index' note, if span are LTR - returns left edge of character, else (for RTL) - returns right bound
